com.pgmacdesign.pgmacutilities.utilities

Class DisplayManagerUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pgmacdesign.pgmacutilities.utilities.DisplayManagerUtilities

  • public class DisplayManagerUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps to determine the screen height and width in Density Pixels (DP) Created by pmacdowell on 8/15/2016.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DisplayManagerUtilities(Context context)
      This will get the width and height of the screen in DP.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      static float convertDpToPixel(float dp, Context context)
      This method converts dp unit to equivalent pixels, depending on device density.
      static float convertPixelsToDp(float px, Context context)
      This method converts device specific pixels to density independent pixels.
      float getDensity() 
      static int getNavigationBarSize(Context context)
      This returns the size of the navigation bar height

      Returns the height of the screen in pixels

      Returns the width of the screen in pixels

      Gets the width of the screen in DP

      Gets the height of the status bar (Above toolbar)
      static int opacityPercent(float percent)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DisplayManagerUtilities

        public DisplayManagerUtilities(Context context)
        This will get the width and height of the screen in DP. This constructor is used to define the instance variables and set them while the other methods are used as accessor/ getters.
        Parameters:
        context - Context from activity would be 'this' and from fragment would be 'getActivity()'

      • convertPixelsToDp

        public static float convertPixelsToDp(float px,
                                      Context context)
        This method converts device specific pixels to density independent pixels.
        Parameters:
        px - A value in px (pixels) unit. Which we need to convert into db
        context - Context to get resources and device specific display metrics
        Returns:
        A float value to represent dp equivalent to px value

      • convertDpToPixel

        public static float convertDpToPixel(float dp,
                                     Context context)
        This method converts dp unit to equivalent pixels, depending on device density.
        Parameters:
        dp - A value in dp (density independent pixels) unit. Which we need to convert into pixels
        context - Context to get resources and device specific display metrics
        Returns:
        A float value to represent px equivalent to dp depending on device density

      • opacityPercent

        public static int opacityPercent(float percent)
        Calculates the % opacity I want to use. higher number means less see-through
        Parameters:
        percent - % to convert, 0 means transparent, 100 means completely blocking background
        Returns:
        int, used like this, view.getBackground().setAlpha(opacityPercent(55));
